abstract: Deals worth nearly $3.5 trillion were announced, a performance favored by low interest rates and high stock prices.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

snippet: Deals worth nearly $3.5 trillion were announced, a performance favored by low interest rates and high stock prices.

headline.main: Deal Makers Notched Nearly $3.5 Trillion Worth in ’14, Best in 7 Years
headline.print_headline: Deal Makers Notched Nearly $3.5 Trillion Worth in ’14, Best in 7 Years
